backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files and components with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of all major frontend components and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, social cards, fonts, and script bootstrap for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing all marketing sections and layout components.
frontend/src/components/marketing/AboutS: About section showing four feature cards highlighting expertise, products, care, and flexibility.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Contact section with WhatsApp CTA, tel link, and location/availability details inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Footer with branding, navigation links, service list, social icons, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Responsive sticky navbar with logo, smooth-scroll links, mobile menu, and a Book Now button.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Hero.t: Hero section with headline, stats, buttons, and smooth scroll behavior plus a banner image.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Highli: Renders three highlight cards describing parlour, home services, and no extra cost.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Displays two detailed cards comparing in‑parlour and home service options with feature lists.
Shows a grid of beauty services, each with an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/marketing/WhatsA: WhatsApp button component that opens a prefilled chat using configured phone number and message.
frontend/src/config/whatsapp.ts: Provides WhatsApp phone number and default message configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login handling, identity persistence, and provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom color variables and theme settings for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including versioning, summary, and a list of implemented features for the beauty parlour website.
